name: Leder-Efter-Trivia
description:
LederEfter is a casual online game with the theme of knowledge trivia in several fields, such as animals, plants, countries and the world. Players will be given 10 true or false questions in one game, where the 10 questions will be displayed randomly and of course the same for each player.

GENRE

Arcade, Casual, Trivia 

CREDITS - ROLE PLAYER

  • Farhan Muhammad
  • Ilham Jalu Prakosa

HOW TO INSTALL

  1. Extract
  2. Install "Leder-Efter.exe" in your windows
  3. Play the game

SINCERELY,

LederEfter - Coursework
